about_the_game:
For even better sounding music

With Music Maker Plus Steam Edition, producing complete songs has never been easier. Use drag and drop to easily combine loops and instruments and apply effects. Music Maker Plus Steam Edition comes packed with sounds, instruments and features worth a total of $299. But that's not all. You also get your choice of one complete Soundpool Collection, one Extra Soundpool, four extra professional VST instruments, four feature packs and two preset packs.
Your music has never sounded this good: Music Maker Plus Steam Edition comes with the world's best-sounding audio engine built right into it, taken from our professional DAW Samplitude. Plus, with its powerful multicore support, Music Maker Plus Steam Edition gives you the performance you need for large-scale productions with tons of loops, instruments and features.

Build your own Music Maker.

Music Maker Plus Steam Edition is tailored to meet your needs as a producer: Create your own custom Music Maker with the sounds, loops, instruments, effects and features you need and want!
Access the Music Maker Store from right within the program and browse the latest sounds from the world's most popular music genres. Equip your Music Maker with new virtual instruments and powerful features like unlimited tracks.

Music Maker Plus Steam Edition:

  • Comes with 1 Soundpool Collection and 1 Extra Soundpool of your choice
  • Includes 4 professional instruments, 4 feature packs and 2 present packs of your choice
  • Easy to use: simply drag and drop to create music
  • Comes with the professional Samplitude audio engine built in for amazing sound
  • Features powerful multicore support for better performance
  • Easy expansion: Get thousands of new sounds, features and instruments – directly in the Music Maker Store.
  • Always up to date: Get free updates for as long as we develop the software

name: Music Maker 2019 Plus Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1280 x 768
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: Produce, record and mix music: Music Maker Plus Steam Edition.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Dutch, Finnish, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Swedish
